item.title: Research
item.description:
My research focuses on advancing the fields of Federated Learning, Privacy-Preserving Computing, and Machine Learning Systems. Below is a list of my key publications and research contributions.

Selected Publications

Federated Learning

  1. “The Cost of Privacy: A Comprehensive Analysis of the Security Issues in Federated Learning”
    Link

  2. “Toward Multimodal Vertical Federated Learning: A Traffic Analysis Case Study”
    Link

  3. “GAN-inspired Defense Against Backdoor Attack on Federated Learning Systems”
    Link

  4. “Subjective Logic-based Decentralized Federated Learning for Non-IID Data”
    Link

item.title: About Me
item.description:
More About Me

Hello! I'm Agnideven Palanisamy Sundar, a researcher with a passion for advancing secure, privacy-preserving, and scalable Artificial Intelligence systems.

I strongly believe in the importance of security in AI, especially in addressing vulnerabilities like backdoor attacks, which can have profound implications for trust in machine learning. My research emphasizes the transformative potential of Federated Learning to build powerful models while ensuring individual privacyâ€”a cornerstone for the future of AI.
